targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT metadata_modification_time FROM system.tables 
WHERE name = 'consumption_daily_v2_1'
AND database = 'cloud_analytics'
targets.rawQuery: SELECT metadata_modification_time FROM system.tables  WHERE name = 'consumption_daily_v2_1' AND database = 'cloud_analytics'

panels.content: ## Если у Вас что-то не работает или Вам не хватает функциональности, пожалуйста, [дайте нам знать](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/21421/).
panels.title: Обратная связь

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
toInt32(date) * 1000 as date,
groupArray( (product, sum_cost))
FROM (

    SELECT multiIf('$aggr_period' = 'day', date, 
                   '$aggr_period' = 'week', toMonday(date),
                   '$aggr_period' = 'month', toStartOfMonth(date), 
                   '$aggr_period' = 'year', toStartOfYear(date),
                   date) AS date, 
           $dimension1 as product,
          sum(cons_sum) as sum_cost
    FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source
    WHERE has([$usage_status], usage_status)=1
    AND has([$consumption_type], cons_type) = 1
    AND has([$service_name], service_name)=1
    AND (has([$billing_account_id], billing_account_id) = 1 OR $billing_account_id = 'All')
    AND has([$segment], segment)=1
    AND has([$person_type], person_type)=1
    AND has([$channel], channel)=1
    AND has([$state], last_state)=1
    AND has([$block_reason], last_block_reason)=1
    AND has([$size], size)=1
    AND has([$core_fraction], core_fraction)=1
    AND has([$preemptible], preemptible)=1
    AND has([$platform], platform)=1
    AND has([$database], database)=1
    GROUP BY date, product
    ORDER BY date, product
)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date
targets.rawQuery: SELECT  toInt32(date) * 1000 as date, groupArray( (product, sum_cost)) FROM (      SELECT multiIf('week' = 'day', date,                     'week' = 'week', toMonday(date),                    'week' = 'month', toStartOfMonth(date),                     'week' = 'year', toStartOfYear(date),                    date) AS date,             total as product,           sum(cons_sum) as sum_cost     FROM cloud_analytics.consumption_daily_v2_1     WHERE has(['trial','paid','disabled'], usage_status)=1     AND has(['trial','paid'], cons_type) = 1     AND has(['compute','mdb','network','storage','ai','nlb','cr','ymq'], service_name)=1     AND (has(['All'], billing_account_id) = 1 OR 'All' = 'All')     AND has(['','csm','enterprise','isv','isv_large','isv_ml','unmanaged','var'], segment)=1     AND has(['company','','individual','switzerland_nonresident_company'], person_type)=1     AND has(['Perfomance','Unknown','Direct','Referrals','Yandex Portal','Organic Search','Sales','Social','Emailing','unknown','Other'], channel)=1     AND has(['','active','inactive','new','payment_not_confirmed','payment_required','suspended'], last_state)=1     AND has(['','Unlocked','antifraud','debt','manual','mining','threshold','trial_expired','unbound_card'], last_block_reason)=1     AND has(['small','micro','unknown','medium','large'], size)=1     AND has(['','5','10','20','50','100'], core_fraction)=1     AND has(['','preemptible'], preemptible)=1     AND has(['','v2','v1'], platform)=1     AND has(['','pg','clickhouse','mysql','mongo','redis','ms_sql'], database)=1     GROUP BY date, product     ORDER BY date, product ) GROUP BY date ORDER BY date
